1.text: Pull your hair back into a ponytail.

2.text: Take a thin section of hair from your ponytail.

3.text: Braid the thin section of hair.

4.text: Wrap the braid around the base of your ponytail.

7.text: Decide where you want your ponytail to start.

8.text: Part your hair down the middle using a rattail comb.

9.text: Divide your hair into four sections.

10.text: Start cornrowing your hair, section by section.

11.text: Finish the cornrow with a regular braid.

13.text: Moisturize dry hair and scalp once everything is braided.

14.text: Tie the braids off into a ponytail.
